name: Make Max - Puzzle Game For Kids
name_original: Make Max - Puzzle Game For Kids
description:
Make Max - Puzzle Game For Kids is a very fun and exciting block match puzzle game, it makes you keep playing for FREE!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Three level to play game: easy, professional, guru.
- Easy: swipe finger six direction(up, down, left, right, upleft, downright) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
- Professional: swipe finger four direction(up, down, left, right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
- guru: swipe finger three direction(upleft, upright, downright) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.
The player wins! when max numbers.

FEATURES
- Game is automatically saved
- Beautiful and simple UI
- High score
